mapper.insert: insert into review (review_num, review_contents, mem_id, review_date) values (#{reviewNum}, #{reviewContents}, #{memId}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select review_num, review_contents, mem_id, review_date from review
mapper.update: update review set review_contents = #{reviewContents}, review_date = sysdate where review_num = #{reviewNum}
